title.narrative: Guinea-Bissau: Targeted country assistance
Guinée-Bissau (la): Aide ciblée aux pays

description.narrative:
L’assistance technique est un soutien non financier fourni par des spécialistes. Elle peut revêtir plusieurs formes : partage d’information et de savoir-faire, formation et services-conseils.
L’assistance technique fournie dans le cadre du PEF est appelée aide ciblée aux pays. Ce type de soutien vise principalement à payer le personnel basé en permanence dans les bureaux pays des partenaires. Il repose sur la demande et les besoins identifiés par les pays eux-mêmes.

Technical assistance is non-financial support provided by specialists. It can take the form of sharing information and expertise, training and consulting services.
The technical assistance provided through PEF is called targeted country assistance (TCA). This type of support mainly consists of staff permanently based in partners’ country offices. It is based on the demand and needs identified by the countries themselves.

Cette activité détaille notre travail sur le Aide ciblée aux pays en Guinée-Bissau (la), grâce à la mise à disposition des données budgétaires et des transactions. Nous fournissons également les documents pertinents qui guident ces activités que sont les formulaires de demande de soutien fournis par le gouvernement de Guinée-Bissau (la) ainsi que les lettres de décisions émises par Gavi, pour progresser. Ces documents décrivent les activités, les objectifs ainsi que les bénéficiaires.

This activity details our work on Targeted country assistance in Guinea-Bissau through the provision of budget and transaction data. We also provide the relevant documents that guide these activities, which are the support request proposal(s) provided by the Government of Guinea-Bissau, as well as the decision letter(s) issued by Gavi, for progress. These documents describe the activities, the objectives as well as the beneficiaries.

title.narrative: WHO
Immunization policy available

target.value: Support for the implementation of Addis declaration roadmap (immunization policy, low on vaccination and resource mobilization)

title.narrative: Legislation on vacciantion procedures approved by the national parliament

target.value: Support for the implementation of Addis declaration roadmap (immunization policy, low on vaccination and resource mobilization)

title.narrative: UNICEF : Demand Promotion & ACSM
Report of the training on C4D for immunization to national counterparts at central and local levels as well as to other partners involved in immunization programme available

target.value: National technical assistant to support increase demand of immunization by the population, to ensure the involvement of community and religious leaders in social mobilization and to follow and monitor the implementation of the Integrated Communication Plan; Prepare document on community engagement framework.

National technical assistant to support increase demand of immunization by the population, to ensure the involvement of community and religious leaders in social mobilization and to follow and monitor the implementation of the Integrated Communication Plan; Prepare document on community engagement framework.

title.narrative: UNICEF : Programme Implementation/Coverage & Equity
Report on staff training and quarterly report on RED/REC implementation plan

target.value: Support the implementation of RED/REC approach: Development of RED/REC implementation plan, training of operational staff, quarterly workshop for learnt lessons' sharing,
Support the implementation of RED/REC approach: Development of RED/REC implementation plan, training of operational staff, quarterly workshop for learnt lessons' sharing,

title.narrative: WHO : Programme Implementation/Coverage & Equity
Report on effective implementation of the urban vaccination strategy available

target.value: Technical support for follow up the implementation of urban vaccination strategy in Bissau and capital city of the regions (Canchungo, Gabu and Bafata)

title.narrative: UNICEF : Health Information Systems (Data)
Report of trained staff on data quality check and validation available

target.value: Technical support of an Immunization Officer to national EPI team for improvement of routine immunization/SIAs data collection tools, data quality improvement and analysis for decision making as well as capacity reinforcement

Technical support of an Immunization Officer to national EPI team for improvement of routine immunization/SIAs data collection tools, data quality improvement and analysis for decision making as well as capacity reinforcement

Technical support of an Immunization Officer to national EPI team for improvement of routine immunization/SIAs data collection tools, data quality improvement and analysis for decision making as well as capacity reinforcement

title.narrative: WHO : Health Information Systems (Data)
1. All data managers at central as well as at regional levels are trainned on DHIS2 2. Quality data on vaccination indicators shared on a quarterly basis

target.value: Technical assistance to support training on DHIS2 platform, monitoring and evaluation of the data quality improvement plan

title.narrative: Report on EPI target population available by age group and gender

target.value: Technical support for coordination of census of EPI target population by using Community Health Worker (CHW)

title.narrative: WHO : Service Delivery
The proposal for the new vaccine (HPV,) introduction developed and submitted

target.value: Technical support for the introduction of the new vaccines (HPV, etc), and monitoring of AEFI during and after the introduction.

title.narrative: UNICEF : Service Delivery
Service delivery related barriers of missed communities to access immunisation services identified and prioritized

target.value: Technical support from one local NGO for implementation of urban strategy in SAB, Bafata and Gabu ? Train activists in the methodology of identifying and registering households with children at vaccine age ? Census of family members with children at vaccine age and follow-up ? Adoption of necessary materials and equipment and production of management tools ? Community mobilization and engagement ? Coordination and management of activities delineated in the Urban Strategy

title.narrative: UNICEF : Data
Data Improvement Plan (DIP) developed

target.value: Technical support of an Immunization Officer to national EPI team for improvement of routine immunization/SIAs data quality improvement and analysis for decision making as well as capacity reinforcement

title.narrative: WHO : Health Financing/Sustainability
Quarterly advocacy and financial report available

target.value: International technical to support MoH and MoF on develompment and implementation of Advocacy and financial sustainability plan that include participation of other stakeholders
International technical to support MoH and MoF on develompment and implementation of Advocacy and financial sustainability plan that include participation of other stakeholders

title.narrative: 1. The annual sustainability plan available. 2. Quarterly report on joint follow up of implementation of advocacy plan available

target.value: International technical to support MoH and MoF on develompment and implementation of Advocacy and financial sustainability plan that include participation of other stakeholders

title.narrative: The situation analysis and all related documts gathered for the development of the NIS plan, and the annual ction plan and regional micoplans developed and validated

target.value: Support the country to developp and implement the National Immunization Strategy (NIS) and annual action plan at central level and micro plan at Regional and District levels

title.narrative: UNICEF : Leadership, management, and coordination (LMC)
Systems in place to track vaccine stocks at all levels and corrective measures undertaken

target.value: Technical assistant for strengthening of the effective vaccine management at all level.

title.narrative: WHO : Data
Data improvement field activity implemented (review, validation, monitoring, harmonisation, mentorship, workshop, others)

target.value: Technical assistance to support training on DHIS2 platform, monitoring and evaluation of the data quality improvement plan

title.narrative: The protocol of the vaccination coverage survey developed and aproved

target.value: Technical support to carry out the vaccination coverage survey

title.narrative: Solina Health : Leadership, management, and coordination (LMC)

The EPI management team is demonstrating sustained change in business as usual as demonstrated by metrics agreed upon in the initial institutional assessment (including vaccine availability, funds availability; workplan execution and ultimately increased vaccination coverage and reduced inequity)

target.value: 1-Strengthen the capacity of the EPI management team in the area of program
1-Strengthen the capacity of the EPI management team in the area of program

title.narrative: The EPI team is demonstrating sustained change in business as usual as demonstrated by improved management of the EPI program, strengthened coordination among stakeholders, improved EPI team productivity, and ultimately increased vaccination coverage and reduced inequity

target.value: 2-Reinforce the leadership of the EPI management team and provide them with the appropriate management approaches, techniques and tools
2-Reinforce the leadership of the EPI management team and provide them with the appropriate management approaches, techniques and tools

title.narrative: Evaluation findings of procedure implementation with recommendations for adjustments shared with the EPI Director and the Gavi Country team

target.value: 3-Support the organizational optimization of the EPI by reviewing the macro-processes and the procedures manual
3-Support the organizational optimization of the EPI by reviewing the macro-processes and the procedures manual

title.narrative: The EPI team is optimally staffed (all key roles at National level filled with competent staff) with demonstrable improvement in staff productivity as a result of a functional performance management system with clear accountabilities

target.value: 4-Develop an EPI human resources management in accordance with recognized standard and initiate performance-based management
4-Develop an EPI human resources management in accordance with recognized standard and initiate performance-based management

title.narrative: The ICC and EPI TWG functioning effectively based on Gavi's recommended standards for National Coordination Forums

target.value: Continue the work to strengthen the Interagency Coordination Committee (ICC) and governance structures
